function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to SARS-CoV-2 virus during testing of the Cu 2 O/PU film","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus from the testing environment","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) during testing","Technologies":"Biohazard safety equipment, containment facilities","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, testing personnel","Owner":"Research institution, laboratory management"},{"Description":"Inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 virus on the coated surface","Impact":"Risk of misleading results if inactivation is not properly verified","Mitigation":"Regular verification of inactivation efficacy through control experiments","Technologies":"Virus detection assays, control samples, verification protocols","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, testing personnel","Owner":"Research institution, laboratory management"},{"Description":"Storage of coated samples under water for 13 days","Impact":"Risk of potential contamination or spread of the virus from the stored samples","Mitigation":"Strict containment protocols for handling and testing of stored samples","Technologies":"Biohazard safety equipment, containment facilities, proper disposal procedures","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, testing personnel","Owner":"Research institution, laboratory management"}]}
